title: BRIEF-Dixie Brands Says Co & Herbal Enterprises Amended Letter Of Intent To Extend Deadline To Reach A Definitive Agreement Until Nov. 14
text:
BRIEF-Dixie Brands Says Co & Herbal Enterprises Amended Letter Of Intent To Extend Deadline To Reach A Definitive Agreement Until Nov. 14

Stock Markets 28 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 07:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Dixie Brands Says Co & Herbal Enterprises Amended Letter Of Intent To Extend Deadline To Reach A Definitive Agreement Until Nov. 14 Sept 27 (Reuters) - Dixie Brands (USA) Inc : * DIXIE BRANDS AND HERBAL ENTERPRISES UPDATE TIMELINE FOR DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO LAUNCH COLLECTION OF THC-INFUSED CANNABIS PRODUCTS * DIXIE BRANDS (USA) INC - CO & HERBAL ENTERPRISES LLC AMENDED LETTER OF INTENT TO EXTEND DEADLINE TO REACH A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT UNTIL NOVEMBER 14

BRIEF-Dixie Brands Says Co & Herbal Enterprises Amended Letter Of Intent To Extend Deadline To Reach A Definitive Agreement Until Nov. 14
